author: cnbc.com
title: Arrow Electronics to Host First-Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
CENTENNIAL, Colo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Arrow Electronics, Inc. (NYSE:ARW) announced that the company will host a conference call to discuss first-quarter 2018 financial results on May 3, 2018, at 1:00 PM ET.
The live conference call is accessible by telephone at 1-866-700-0133 (toll-free) or 1-617-213-8831 for participants outside the United States and Canada. The access code is 97833807.
Audio replay of the call will be available through May 17, 2018. The replay numbers are 1-888-286-8010 for the United States and Canada and 1-617-801-6888 for callers from other countries. The access code is 97833807. The conference call will also be available via webcast. To access the live webcast, visit investor.arrow.com . The webcast replay will be available through May 17, 2018.
Arrow Electronics ( www.arrow.com ) is a global provider of products, services and solutions to industrial and commercial users of electronic components and enterprise computing solutions. Arrow serves as a supply channel partner for more than 150,000 original equipment manufacturers, value-added resellers, contract manufacturers, and commercial customers through a global network. The company maintains over 300 sales facilities and 45 distribution and value-added centers, serving over 80 countries.
